name: Dragonfire
description:
Dragonfire is a 1982 video game written by Bob Smith and published by Imagic. The player grabs treasure guarded by a dragon while avoiding fireballs. It was originally released for the Atari 2600 then ported to the Intellivision, VIC-20, Commodore 64, Apple II, ZX Spectrum, ColecoVision, and Tandy Color Computer.

The game's source code was made available as public domain software by developer Bob Smith on May 24, 2003.
